title: MY VOICE CHAT IS BROKEN!
body:
So in the new voice chat, my lobby peeps can hear and the game recognises that they are talking back to me, indicated by the green circle, however i am not hearing them. I have fiddled with settings, verified files, and firewalls and updated drivers, yet with no avail. 

Please Help meh please. {{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/1RqhIuBl-for-those-whos-voice-chat-isnt-working-fix 

Try this and see if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=I AM IMMORTAL ,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=E3Au9kdG,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-22T13:32:17.197+0000)
>
> So in the new voice chat, my lobby peeps can hear and the game recognises that they are talking back to me, indicated by the green circle, however i am not hearing them. I have fiddled with settings, verified files, and firewalls and updated drivers, yet with no avail. 
> 
> Please Help meh please. {{summoner:4}}

I don't know how to help with your issue since I haven't dabbled in voice chat. I would recommend submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and troubleshoot voice chat with Player Support. Since you did what you could on your own, I think that's the next logical step.
